# spacelift_vcs_agent_pools (Data Source)

`spacelift_vcs_agent_pools` represents the VCS agent pools assigned to the Spacelift account.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "spacelift_vcs_agent_pools" "vcs-agent-pools" {}
```
